conbody.p: This water heater comes equipped with the iCOMM™ remote monitoring system. This system allows users to monitor critical operations and diagnose issues remotely using the manufacture’s water heater app (available for IOS and Android).

The iCOMM system can automatically notify selected personnel via email and or mobil phone text messages if operational problems or user-defined alert conditions occur. The system is expandable to meet the needs of multiple heaters and groups of heaters.
